titleStmt.title: The ciuile wars betweene the howses of Lancaster and Yorke corrected and continued by Samuel Daniel one of the groomes of hir Maiesties most honorable Priuie Chamber
Civil wars
titleStmt.author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.
Cockson, Thomas, engraver.

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved and signed "T Cocksonus, sculp:".

E4 is a cancel, with E4v having a side-note to stanza 26 containing the words "shire, that". Variant 1: another setting of the cancel, with "shire that". Variant 2: E4 is the cancellandum, with no side-note to stanza 26.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
